QuestData.Title: The Key Is Around Here Somewhere...
QuestData.Description: Well aren't ye a sight fer sore eyes!$b$bIt's no use tryin' to bust open this cage, this one needs a key!$b$bNow, I know what yer thinkin', "How is it possible that the Burnin' Legion could capture a dwarf as mighty as ol' Angus here."$b$bYe can rest easy knowin' I let myself be captured. I'm here to rescue a dear friend o' mine, an' gettin' captured was the only way!$b$bI had the key in me pocket... but it musta' fell out.$b$bIt's errm... around here somewhere.$b$bA felhunter ate it a wee while back...
QuestData.RewardText: Ye found the key! Quickly, see if it fits...$b$bAye, that's the one! Ye did it!
